result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Jeanette D.L. Kolpien

records.addlTxt: Letter to defendant with signature bond ordered in court 10-19-2022. Request to return signed bond and Affidavit of Witness form to Clerk of Court no later than 10-28-2022.

Conditions:
No contact with S.K.
Defendant to maintain absolute sobriety.
Defendant not to drive without a valid driver's license and IID installed.
Plea hearing on January 9, 2023 at 09:00 am.

9:50 AM cases 22CF518, 22CF614 and 22CM600 called. Defendant Jeanette D.L. Kolpien not in court.  Attorney Francis Xavier Rivard in court for Jeanette D.L. Kolpien.  Prosecuting attorney Andrew James Gunderson in court for the State of Wisconsin. Defendant is in in patient treatment for the next two months. State in compliance with victim notification requirements. Defense requests bond modification- no objection from the STate. 
No contact with G.K. is to be removed from the bond. 
A plea hearing is scheduled for 1/9/23 at 9:00 am (30 min).
Status conference on October 19, 2022 at 09:30 am.

11:18 AM Cases called: 22CF518, 22CF614 & 22CM600 Defendant Jeanette D.L. Kolpien not in court, she is in treatment for the next 3 months.  Attorney Francis Xavier Rivard in court for Jeanette D.L. Kolpien.  Attorney Afton Lewis in court for State of Wisconsin. Defense requests a date after that time. 
STC: 10/19/22 at 9:30am
Status conference on August 17, 2022 at 11:05 am.

(Cases called at 10:06 AM - 22CF518, 22CF614, 22CM600)
Defendant Jeanette D.L. Kolpien appeared by video, in custody, from Pierce County Jail.  Attorney Francis Xavier Rivard in court for Jeanette D.L. Kolpien.  Attorney Trenton John Piltz Mr in court for State of Wisconsin. 
No resolution at this time.  Defense waives reading of the Complaint in 22CM600 and enters Not Guilty pleas as well - signature bond set.
Status Conference: August 17, 2022 at 11:05 AM (Defendant may appear via Zoom if she appears in custody elsewhere)
Status conference on July 20, 2022 at 10:05 am.
Status conference on July 20, 2022 at 10:05 am.

(2:03 PM cases 22CF518, 22CF614 called.) 
Prosecuting attorney Trenton Piltz in court for the State of Wisconsin. Defendant Jeanette D.L. Kolpien does not appear in court. Attorney Francis Xavier Rivard in court for Jeanette D.L. Kolpien.
Court notes the court is running late and the defendant may no longer be able to accommodate an appearance from the Pierce County Jail.
Attorney Rivard advises the defendant is in custody in Pierce County but due to starting the hearing late, the defendant may no longer be able to appear.
Attorney Rivard advises were going to handle the Arraignments today and were going to request possible bond modification.
Attorney Rivard advises since the defendant isn't present, should reschedule.
Defendant joins the hearing at 2:08 pm from the Pierce County Jail via video.
Defendant waives reading of Information in cases 22CF518, 22CF614 and enters Not Guilty pleas, which the Court receives. 
Status Conference scheduled for July 20, 2022 at 10:05 am.

Conditions:
No contact with G.K. or S.K.
Defendant to maintain absolute sobriety.
Defendant not to drive without a valid driver's license and IID installed.

Conditions:
No contact with G.K. or S.K.
Defendant to maintain absolute sobriety.
Defendant not to drive without a valid driver's license and IID installed.
See INIT as to details of the waiver.

9:58 AM cases 22CF518 and 22CF614 called. Prosecuting attorney Loralee Clark in court for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant Jeanette D.L. Kolpien appeared by video, in custody (Pierce).  Attorney Francis Xavier Rivard in court for Jeanette D.L. Kolpien. 
In 22CF614: Defense advises defendant of charges. Waives reading of the complaint. Defendant objects to the no contacts requested by the State. Court orders no contacts as requested by the STate. 
In both files:  Defendant waives right to a preliminary hearing and Court accepts waiver. 
Both Files: ARGN scheduled in Br 4 on 6/22/22 at 1:45 PM. Court will also hear request to modify bond at this time.
